system.effect:
If the character has gained at least 3 Pain Tokens during an encounter, they may spend a Fate Point to gain Fear (1) Trait, or increase an existing Fear Trait by 1 (up to Fear(3)) for the rest of the encounter. While benefiting from this Fear Trait, they add +10 to all Intimidate and Command Tests.
Fear (X): Enemies encountering someone with this trait make a Willpower test modifed based on X, on failiure roll on Table 10-4 Shock, add +10 for each degree of failiure. X may be: 1 (-0 to Test), 2 (-10), 3 (-20), or 4 (-30)
